network_overview: The trace shows only control-plane traffic: LTE S1-AP/X2-AP, Diameter, GTP-C and DNS bursts inside the operator’s CG-NAT pool. No SIP, RTP or user-plane GTP-U was captured, so voice/IMS status cannot be assessed.

observations.finding: Diameter Cmd-318/316/324 requests consistently answered with Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS); no errors observed.
observations.evidence: pkt_4: Cmd-318 answer cause=2001; pkt_16: Cmd-316 answer cause=2001; pkt_20: Cmd-324 answer cause=2001

observations.finding: S1-AP Proc-11 and Proc-13 exchanged every ~30 s between eNB 10.47.19.6 and MME 10.233.39.38 with no failure causes logged.
Three short DNS bursts (12 pkts in <2 ms) on 100.65.172.x addresses indicate CG-NAT pool DNS replies, rate ~7 kpkt/s.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, SDP or IMS-related protocols captured
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Mirror the IMS-core (P-CSCF/S-CSCF) or SGi/N6 interface carrying SIP/RTP

inconclusive_aspects.reason: GTP-U tunnels not observed (0 GTP tunnels listed)
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on S1-U or SGi where GTP-U TEIDs appear

inconclusive_aspects.reason: S1-AP cause IE always null; no X2-AP handover report
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: X2 or S1 trace with HandoverRequired/HandoverRequest messages

recommendations.action: Collect simultaneous SIP+RTP capture at IMS-core or SGi to verify call completion
recommendations.rationale: Current trace lacks voice protocols; cannot confirm call establishment

recommendations.action: Monitor DNS burst pattern for potential reflection/amplification inside CG-NAT
recommendations.rationale: 7 kpkt/s DNS replies in 2 ms bursts are atypical for single UE queries

session_analysis.signaling_health: Diameter and S1-AP exchanges show only success (2001) and null-cause; no retransmissions or errors observed.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U or user-plane packets captured; bearer status unknown.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point (no RTP).

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant MME
    participant eNB
    participant HSS
    Note over MME,HSS: Only control-plane observed
    MME->>eNB: S1-AP Proc-11 (frame 2)
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Proc-13 (frame 5)
    MME->>HSS: Diameter Cmd-318 (pkt_1)
    HSS->>MME: Diameter Cmd-318 2001 (pkt_4)
    MME->>eNB: S1-AP Proc-11 (frame 8)
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Proc-13 (frame 10)
    Note right of MME: Pattern repeats every ~30s
